title: Lethal Inspection
blurb: Fry! Quit doing the right thing, you jerk! Kif might! Dear God, they'll be killed on our doorstep! And there's no trash pickup until January 3rd. No! The kind with looting and maybe starting a few fires! Say it in Russian!
body:
The Why of Fry

I decline the title of Iron Cook and accept the lesser title of Zinc Saucier, which I just made up. Uhh… also, comes with double prize money. Look, everyone wants to be like Germany, but do we really have the pure strength of 'will'? For the last time, I don't like lilacs! Your 'first' wife was the one who liked lilacs!

  • I guess if you want children beaten, you have to do it yourself.
  • Incidentally, you have a dime up your nose.
  • I've got to find a way to escape the horrible ravages of youth. Suddenly, I'm going to the bathroom like clockwork, every three hours. And those jerks at Social Security stopped sending me checks. Now 'I'' have to pay ''them'!
  • For the last time, I don't like lilacs! Your 'first' wife was the one who liked lilacs!

A Clockwork Origin

Kids don't turn rotten just from watching TV. Goodbye, friends. I never thought I'd die like this. But I always really hoped. I guess if you want children beaten, you have to do it yourself.
